ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Interface ParticipantManager

public interface ParticipantManager

Class that manages a set of participants.

Method Summary
 void addParticipant(int participantId, Forwarder forwarder, ParticipantConnection connection)
          Adds a participant to the session.
 ParticipantConnection getConnection(int participantId)
          Gets the participant connection for the given participant.
 int getParticipantId(String userId)
          The participant id for the given user.

          Notifies the participant manager that the given user has accepted an invitation.
 void invitationRejected(String userId)
          Notifies the participant manager that the given user has rejected an invitation.

          Determines whether the given user is on the blacklist and should therefore not be allowed to join.

          Determines whether the given user was invited by the publisher.
 boolean isJoining(String userId)
          Determines whether the given user has already a join request that is in progress.

          Notifies the participant manager that the given participant has left the session.

Method Detail

getParticipantId

int getParticipantId(String userId)
The participant id for the given user. It is up to the implementation to determine which participant id should be given to the user. A possible implementation would give the same user always the same participant id.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user
Returns:
the participant id for that particular user

isBlackListed

boolean isBlackListed(String userId)
Determines whether the given user is on the blacklist and should therefore not be allowed to join.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user
Returns:
true iff the user is on the blacklist

isJoining

boolean isJoining(String userId)
Determines whether the given user has already a join request that is in progress.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user
Returns:
true iff the user is already joining

isParticipant

boolean isParticipant(String userId)
Determines whether the given user is already a participant in the session.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user
Returns:
true iff the user is already in the session

isInvited

boolean isInvited(String userId)
Determines whether the given user was invited by the publisher.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user
Returns:
true iff the user was invited

addParticipant

void addParticipant(int participantId,
                    Forwarder forwarder,
                    ParticipantConnection connection)
Adds a participant to the session.

Parameters:
participantId - the id of the participant
forwarder - the forwarder for the participant
connection - the connection to the participant

participantKicked

void participantKicked(int participantId)
Notifies the participant manager that the given participant has been kicked.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant that has been kicked

participantLeft

void participantLeft(int participantId)
Notifies the participant manager that the given participant has left the session.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant that left the session

userInvited

void userInvited(String userId)
Notifies the participant manager that the given user has been invited to this session.

Parameters:
userId - the user id of the invited user

invitationRejected

void invitationRejected(String userId)
Notifies the participant manager that the given user has rejected an invitation.

Parameters:
userId - the user id of the user that rejected an invitation

invitationAccepted

Notifies the participant manager that the given user has accepted an invitation.

Parameters:
userId - the user id of the user that accepted an invitation

joinRequested

void joinRequested(String userId)
Notifies the participant manager that the user wants to join.

Parameters:
userId - the user id of the joining user

joinRequestAccepted

void joinRequestAccepted(String userId)
Notifies the participant manager that the user's join request was accepted.

Parameters:
userId - the user whose join request was accepted

joinRequestRejected

void joinRequestRejected(String userId)
Notifies the participant manager that the user's join request was rejected.

Parameters:
userId - the user id the joining user

getConnection

ParticipantConnection getConnection(int participantId)
Gets the participant connection for the given participant.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant's id
Returns:
the participant connection for that participant or null
